queries.querystring: select distinct r.*,count(v.dbn_repv_viewname) Views_Used, min(e.Ref_Status) Extr_Status from dbn_report r, dbn_report_views v, dbn_entities e where (v.dbn_repv_viewname = e.ViewName) and (v.dbn_repv_parid = r.dbn_rep_id) and r.dbn_rep_id ='pRID'

Select DISTINCT concat('MRN_SPE09#01##',qry.stto,'#0#',qry.stto) DEST, concat('MRN_SPE09#01##',qry.stfrom,'#0#',qry.stfrom) STORE, concat('MRN_SPE01#STRAN&arg1=',qry.transaction) ILIAS, qry.transaction Trf, qry.REQNO, concat('MRN_SPE09#05##',qry.NSN,'#1#',qry.NSN) '______NSN_____', qry.DESCRIPTION, qry.MACODE, qry.Qty, date(qry.trfdate) '__Trfdate_', qry.status, qry.comments, qry.shortsscc SSCC from (SELECT distinct mt.stfrom , mt.stto , mt.transaction , mt.Reqno , mt_nsn.NSN , mn.Description , mn.macode , sum(mt_NSN.Qty) as 'Qty' , date(mt.trfdate) as 'trfdate' , mt.status , mt.comments , mt_nsn.sscc , substr(mt_nsn.sscc,9,16) as ShortSSCC , mt_nsn.asset from mrqr_transfers mt left join mrqr_transfers_nsn mt_nsn on mt.transaction=mt_nsn.transaction left join mrqr_nsn mn on mt_nsn.nsn=mn.nsn where (length(replace(replace('pNSN','%',''),'_',''))>=3 OR length(replace(replace('pSTORE','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pDESTINATION','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pMACODE','%',''),'_',''))>=2 ) and if('pDESTINATION'='',true,mt.stto like 'pDESTINATION') and IF('pSTORE'='',true, mt.stfrom like 'pSTORE') and IF('pREQNO'='',true, mt.reqno like 'pREQNO') and IF('pSSCC'='',true, mt_nsn.sscc like 'pSSCC') and IF('pNSN'='',true, mt_nsn.nsn like 'pNSN') and IF('pMACODE'='',true, mn.macode like 'pMACODE') and IF('pTRANSFER'='',true, mt.transaction like 'pTRANSFER')
group by mt.transaction, mt_nsn.nsn order by date(mt.trfdate) desc )qry where (length(replace(replace('pNSN','%',''),'_',''))>=3 OR length(replace(replace('pSTORE','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pDESTINATION','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pMACODE','%',''),'_',''))>=2 )
